Text: Don't be fooled! This is a DIY 'episode', home movie-style starring the poster's kids.
Mmmm its quite a good D.I.Y episode but it would have been good without all the subdafuge i.e. this is a tribute to Doctor Who which I am made with my kids
Actually, the kids are my brothers :P definately a fun project to create..
